name: agent
title: Agent
description: An agent is something that bears some form of responsibility for an activity taking place, for the existence of an entity, or for another agent's activity (https://www.w3.org/TR/prov-o/#Agent).

fields.name: agentID
fields.description: The unique identifier for an Agent.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.
fields.examples: `https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1825-0097` (for a person); `https://ror.org/015hz7p22` (for an organization); `http://grscicoll.org/institution/museum-southwestern-biology` (for an organization); `https://www.gbif.org/grscicoll/collection/fbd3ed74-5a21-4e01-b86a-33d36f032d9c` (for a collection)

fields.name: parentAgentID
fields.description: The identifier for the broader Agent in which this Agent is grouped.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: agentType
fields.description: The category that best matches the Agent.

fields.name: agentPreferredName
fields.description: The preferred form of the name when referring to the agent.
